entry.name: jQuery.mobile.getDocumentBase
entry.title: jQuery.mobile.getDocumentBase()
entry.desc:
Utility method for retrieving the original document base URL.
Note: is deprecated as of jQuery Mobile 1.4.0 and will be removed in 1.5.0. Use the jQuery.mobile.path.getDocumentBase() method instead.

argument.name: asParsedObject
argument.desc: The function normally returns the original document base URL as a string. However, if you specify a truthy value for this parameter, the original document base URL will be returned in a hash as a parsed URL.
